desc: Beautiful, colorful, handcrafted candles made on the incredible island of Jersey by Catriona, a primary school teacher. These candles are 100% soy dyed with vegan and cruelty free dyes and fragranced with amazing scents.

layout.text: Whether you want to decorate your home, give a gift to your loved ones or de-stress, Casife Candles has a wide range of amazing scents and candles to choose from!
